fields.name: Engine & Performance
fields.description: Maintain your engine’s health with regular oil changes, air filter replacements, and fuel system cleaning to keep your vehicle running smoothly.

fields.name: Tires & Wheels
fields.description: Ensure optimal tire performance by regularly rotating your tires, checking tire pressure, and maintaining wheel alignment for a smoother drive.

fields.name: Brakes & Suspension
fields.description: Maintain safe driving conditions with regular brake fluid checks, brake pad replacements, and suspension system inspections.

fields.name: Battery & Electrical
fields.description: Keep your vehicle’s electrical systems running by checking the battery, inspecting the alternator, and replacing light bulbs when needed.

fields.name: Transmission & Drivetrain
fields.description: Extend the life of your transmission by checking and changing the fluid regularly, and inspecting the clutch and drive belts.

fields.name: Cooling & Heating
fields.description: Ensure your vehicle runs at the right temperature by checking coolant levels, flushing the radiator, and maintaining the air conditioning system.

fields.name: Exterior & Bodywork
fields.description: Preserve your vehicle’s exterior by replacing windshield wipers, inspecting for damage, and regularly waxing to protect the paint.

fields.name: Interior & Comfort
fields.description: Stay comfortable with regular checks on cabin air filters, seatbelts, and the HVAC system to ensure a pleasant driving experience.

fields.name: Miscellaneous Services
fields.description: Track important tasks like vehicle inspections, optimizing fuel efficiency, and staying informed about any vehicle recalls that may affect your car.
